articles.description: June 1 is the official start to Atlantic hurricane season, but a weather system forming now may make this the sixth straight year with a tropical system forming before that date.
articles.content:
May 20, 2019 -- Subtropical Storm Andrea 
 May 25, 2018 -- Tropical Storm Alberto
 April 19, 2017 -- Tropical Storm Arlene
 January 12, 2016 -- Hurricane Alex
 May 27, 2016 -- Tropical Storm Bonnie
 May 8, 2015 -- Tropical Storm Ana
